channel.title: Invisible items? Invisible NPC'S?
channel.description:
ok, during my modeling project of a 317-508. I came up with some errors(not compiling errors)
Error Report 1:
Some items turn invisible when you equip them.
EX 1: I equipped the black cavalier with mask, and it turned my players head invisible.
EX 2: Some items, even added correctly to code, give me thread-3 error when I look at them.
Error Report 2:
NPC'S added through client are invisible.
EX 1: I added the new dark beast to the client section class5.java and they turn Invisible.
EX 2: The 508 NPC'S turn invisible when you get near them.
Error Report 3:
Map and Animation's.
EX 1: When I use the Dragon Claws special it makes a duck appear not the acual special.
EX 2: When I go into Godwars Dungeon, it flickers black then the acual map data.
If you have any suggestions for me I'm willing to take them, if you solve some of my client wise problems you will be rewarded with credits and rep++.
for stubborn people like cocoa, I have the right int's and added them into item.cfg, item.java and it a weapon client.java.
- wolf

item.title: Invisible items? Invisible NPC'S?
item.dc:creator: @Srnex Srnex
item.description:
@Srnex wrote:

DatMaker.
You didn’t set the animation.

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible items? Invisible NPC'S?
item.dc:creator: @wolfs_goal wolfs goal
item.description:
@wolfs_goal wrote:

lol, but seriously, why are the npc’s acting weird? i mean i added new npc’s before but now they turn invisible…

its like… well

look up nico-do 2nd on youtube…

its like that

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible items? Invisible NPC'S?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

[quote=“adamp40, post:4, topic:255219”][quote author=SilentCJ link=topic=337264.msg2619083#msg2619083 date=1231258652]
Na my client can’t add gfx’s either.
[/quote]

My clients “add model” doesnt work properly… i have to type another number at the beggining of the model no for it to work. To add model 9999 i have to type add model 99999

Any ideas why (its a very old version RichScape and Galkons Client)[/quote]

Search

add model

In your client’s client.java and you should see a little bit of code underneath, if you can understand some english and a bit of advanced java then you should easily be able to work it out.

Read full topic

item.title: Invisible items? Invisible NPC'S?
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

Na my client can’t add gfx’s either.
What client base are you using?
I’m using the oldest Galkon’s base, and it just won’t let me add gfx’s, put the code and change the spotanimcount in class23 but some random crap like battleaxes appear lol.

And i told you about the other problems in your main topic.

Read full topic

quack quack
